DOC.brief_title: Pomegranate Supplementation Well-Being Among Medical Students Residents
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study investigate feasibility conduct randomized trial pomegranate supplementation medical student resident , see whether evidence effect report emotional physical well-being . Phase 1 pilot 10 participant receive pomegranate supplement 28 day . In phase 2 , randomize 40 participant ( 1:1 ) receive either pomegranate supplement placebo . For phase , measure self report emotional physical well-being use several questionnaire , conduct laboratory test measure oxidative stress inflammatory biomarkers blood , metabolite pomegranate urine .
